description.zh-cn: 中国妇产科学家，曾任上海医科大学教授、博士生导师，为中国共产党党员。
description.en: Chinese obstetrician and gynecologist, former professor and doctoral supervisor at Shanghai Medical University, and a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省下辖的地级市，是张惜阴的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zhang Xiyin.

description.zh-cn: 中国上海市的一所高等医学院校，张惜阴曾在此担任教授。
description.en: A higher medical college in Shanghai, China, where Zhang Xiyin once served as a professor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张惜阴出生于江苏无锡。
description.en: Zhang Xiyin was born in Wuxi, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 张惜阴曾任上海医科大学教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Zhang Xiyin served as a professor and doctoral supervisor at Shanghai Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，张惜阴是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page category information, Zhang Xiyin was a member of the Communist Party of China.
